caption.p:
HAADF-STEM image of the η″ phase in the 30.0 at.%Fe alloy quenched from 300°C taken along the [100]
Cmcm orientation. Regions with slightly bright contrast in the c-axis chain are highlighted by white arrows. The monoclinic unit cell of the motif structure of the η″ phase is indicated by magenta and green parallelograms.
